Text: Meeting time change Cc CNG called back late yesterday and asked to move next weeks meeting from pm to pm We will still meet in room c Thanks md

Re CNG Training Cc be in room c Thanks md Molly CT PM To Chris CT Marde L ES cc Angie NRON Subject Re CNG Training Angie and I will both plan on being there Victor is out for the rest of the week Just let us know where we will be meeting Thanks Chris Germany PM To Angie NRON Molly CT Victor CT cc Marde L ES Subject Re CNG Training There is only a small chance that I will attend Vic make sure andor Angie go Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM From Marde L ES on PM To Chris CT cc Angie CT Molly CT Victor CT Subject Re CNG Training Sorry Chris Im too efficient You told me to set it up and I did Thursday afternoon Please let me know if you plan to attend so that I can get a conference room big enough for everyone Thanks md Chris CT PM To Angie NRON Molly CT Victor CT cc Marde L ES Subject CNG Training CNG would like to stop by the office to do some TTT training next Wed Thur or Fri Please let Marde know if you have a preference as to which day you would like to meet with CNG I may or may not be here Thanks

HUMjust saw this message posted for PNG This doesnt have anything to do with you guys does it md CUSTOMER ACQUISITION DEADLINES st of Month Files with customer changes must be received to be effective for next months business Within days of Confirmation letter sent to customer Receiving file Within days of Exception reports sent to pool operator via the Internet Receiving file th of Month Complete list of customer including months of usage history for the forthcoming month sent to pool operators PNG FILE SUBMISSION DEADLINES File Due to PNG Effective by pm on Revenue Month January February February March March April March May May June June July June August August September September October October November November December December January

RE ET scheduler contact listinfo Thanks md Forwarded by Marde L DriscollHOUEES on AM Franklin Scott on AM To Franklin Scott cc Oliphant Gordon DiCarlo Louis Subject RE ET scheduler contact list Tim ET has had wholesale changes in its personnel recently Heres the three contacts that I talk to East John Ed James Midwest Tom Dickey West Allen King If they cant handle the transaction they know who can Note that both John Ed James and Tom Dickey will be leaving the company at the end of the summer Allen King is basis backup for the West but he has always handled my FOM deals Allen will be moving with ET to Bethesda Minor intramonth changes usually can be done by the scheduler at ET theyll tell you if you need to talk to a trader Thanks Scott Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday June AM To Cc Subject Re ET scheduler contact list Scott Thanks for the update Are these contacts for scheduling purposes only If so do you have the trader contacts Please advise Thanks Tim Franklin Scott on AM To cc DiCarlo Louis Oliphant Gordon Subject ET scheduler contact list Tim Laura and Marde Please send this file to rest of your schedulers Thanks Scott See attached file ET Contactsxls PGE Energy Services Corporation and PGE Energy Services Ventures LLC are not the same company as Pacific Gas and Electric Company the utility and are not regulated by the California Public Utilities Commission If you are a customer of Pacific Gas and Electric Company you are not required to purchase services from PGE Energy Services Corporation or PGE Energy Services Ventures LLC in order to continue to receive quality regulated services from the utility
